input_text:
Job Title: Art Director, Marketing - Lakeland

Location: Lakeland, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Marketing

Description:
In Creative Services, Art Director develops creative concepts that align with creative strategies, marketing objectives, and marketing strategies, all while communicating the visual expression of the Publix brand. Ideal candidates are creative with effective communication, collaboration, and research skills. Additionally, they have strong time management skills and can manage multiple projects at the same time.
Additional responsibilities include:develop relevant and unique concepts that support marketing business objectives, align with creative strategy, and strengthen the Publix brand provide direction to creative resources that are contributing to the project development for photo and video assets used for a variety of customer-facing integrated communications, including but not limited to print, POP, social media, adaptive or responsive websites (desktop/mobile), mobile apps, email, digital ads, direct mail, videos, and other necessary content direct Sr. Designers, Designers, and Motion Designers in the execution of design mechanicals and final files, ensuring final design delivers upon intended concept, meets strategy, is technically and aesthetically excellent stay up to date on industry and market trends, including evolving technology foster professional growth of fellow associates by providing mentoring and guidance 
In Publix's corporate offices, we value in-person interactions, similar to those our store associates have with customers. Many of Publix's corporate offices offer work from home up to two days a week. Each business area implements their policy differently and should be discussed during interviews
Required Qualifications :Bachelor of Fine Arts degree in Graphics field or equivalent experience at least four years of experience in graphic design knowledge of concept development process and highly skilled in concepting a variety of advertising elements (social media ads, video, OOH, POP, direct mail, posters, packaging, environmental signage, etc.) knowledge of traditional and digital media channels (e.g., print, in-store, video, pre-roll, radio, TV, social and digital, adaptive/responsive websites, apps, mobile sites), including best practices, strengths, and limitations knowledge of art direction and design process knowledge of Marketing department workflow processes and project lifecycles knowledge of industry, market trends, and business objectives knowledge of digital, printing, broadcast, and distribution processes (e.g., file preparation for digital channels and packaging for physical printing) knowledge of the Publix target customer, brand, and lines of business ability to evaluate creative work for effectiveness against established creative strategies and objectives highly skilled in typography, layout, and composition strategic thinker with passion for delivering great work and meaningful results excellent presentation skills computer skills including Mac OS, Adobe Creative Suite, Keynote and Microsoft Office 
Preferred Qualifications :two or more years as a Junior Art Director (or equivalent), or five or more years experience in graphic design 
Frequency of Pay: MonthlyPotential Annual Pay with Bonus: 83,265 - 126,815Minimum Base Pay: 6,405Maximum Base Pay: 9,755
Year End Bonus :As a year-end bonus to associates, Publix issues one month’s extra pay (pro-rated in the first year) each year if associate remains employed through issue date of the bonus check that year. This is calculated as a 13th month of pay in the Potential Annual Pay with Bonus line above.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Art Director, Marketing
output_json.summary: Art Director develops creative concepts that align with marketing objectives and strategies, focusing on the Publix brand's visual expression.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor of Fine Arts degree in Graphics field or equivalent experience
optional_skills: concepting a variety of advertising elements
knowledge of traditional and digital media channels
knowledge of art direction and design process
knowledge of Marketing department workflow processes and project lifecycles
knowledge of industry, market trends, and business objectives
knowledge of digital, printing, broadcast, and distribution processes
highly skilled in typography, layout, and composition
computer skills including Mac OS, Adobe Creative Suite, Keynote, and Microsoft Office
job_responsibilities: Develop relevant and unique concepts supporting marketing business objectives
Align concepts with creative strategy and strengthen the Publix brand
Provide direction to creative resources for photo and video assets
Direct Sr. Designers, Designers, and Motion Designers in design execution
Ensure final design meets concept, strategy, and technical excellence
Stay updated on industry and market trends
Foster professional growth of fellow associates
Evaluate creative work against established strategies and objectives
Deliver great work and meaningful results
benefits: Monthly Potential Annual Pay with Bonus: 83,265 - 126,815
Year End Bonus: One month’s extra pay (pro-rated in the first year) each year if associate remains employed through issue date of the bonus check that year.
output_json.company_information: Publix's corporate offices value in-person interactions, offering work from home up to two days a week.
